bibl.title: Reconstructing the Archives of the Monastery of Apollo at Bawit.
bibl.note: Monasteries of Apollo in Egypt. - The supposed Monastery of Apollo at Oxyrhynchus. - The Monastery of Apollo at Memphis. - The Monastery of Apollo at Titkooh = Bawit. - Texts 1-6 [coptic].

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I

bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah, Reconstructing the Archives of the Monastery of Apollo at Bawit.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 219-236 et pll. VI-VIII n./bl. et coul.
Monasteries of Apollo in Egypt. - The supposed Monastery of Apollo at Oxyrhynchus. - The Monastery of Apollo at Memphis. - The Monastery of Apollo at Titkooh = Bawit. - Texts 1-6 [coptic].
